stimulusHtml: The linear acceleration of the person’s hand during the time interval Δt is

features.html:
The following questions are related to this scenario:

A solid cylinder of mass m and radius R has a string wound around it. A person holding the string pulls it vertically upward, as shown above, such that the cylinder is suspended in midair for a brief time interval Δt and its center of mass does not move.
